meta.content: Three Oaks Public School Academy is a tuition-free kindergarten through fifth-grade public school. We empower all students with the academic knowledge and skills, work habits, and character traits to gain access to the American Dream.
Three Oaks Public School Academy - Engaged. Empowered. Excellence.

Three Oaks Public School Academy is a tuition-free kindergarten through fifth-grade public school. We empower all students with the academic knowledge and skills, work habits, and character traits to gain access to the American Dream.

strong.a: Click here to access updates regarding COVID-19

img.alt: Three Oaks Public School student studying in class

span.strong: Three Oaks Public School Academy is a tuition-free PreK through sixth-grade public school.

p.span: After more than five years of research, planning and development by educators and parents, Three Oaks Public School Academy opened in 2003 with 90 students and now houses 375 students. Three Oaks Public School Academy is managed by Choice Schools Associates and is authorized by Bay Mills Community College to offer PreK through sixth-grade education for a maximum enrollment of 400 students.

img.alt: Three Oaks Public School female students smiling at lunch

p.span: Are you looking for a safe and caring school family for your child? You’ve come to the right place! We pride ourselves on offering a safe space for all of our students.

img.alt: Three Oaks Public School male student learning on laptop

p.span: We pride ourselves on providing the best education in Muskegon County! Enroll your child in our Kindergarten program today.

img.alt: Three Oaks Public School students posing by school bus

p.span: Three Oaks offers bus transportation to students who live within a four-mile radius of the school. Students who ride the bus must demonstrate good behavior.

div.p:
1212 Kingsley Street
Muskegon, MI 49442
(231) 767-3365 - Phone
(231) 777-9815 - Fax

img.alt: Supported by Choice Schools Associates - Winner of the Detroit Free Press award Top Work Places for 2017 & 2018
